entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill near minus 24. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 26.
